name.baseName: Sieving and crushing plant ; Washed Blended coal ; Bituminous coal and anthracite coal ; Lump coal is washed, and fine coal is not washed ; 1.2~10 million t/a; NESPS2
筛分破碎车间 ; 洗混煤 ; 烟煤和无烟煤 ; 块煤入洗、末煤不入洗 ; 120-1000万吨/年 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Standard coalisBag filter，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management90，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / normal production time (hours/year)

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Standard coalisBag filter，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management90，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / normal production time (hours/year)
technology.technologicalApplicability: 所述工业过程用于筛分和破碎厂操作，用于处理混合煤，特别是烟煤和无烟煤。块煤经过洗涤过程以去除杂质，而细煤则不洗。该过程适用于处理从120万到1000万吨不等的大规模煤炭加工操作。另外，该过程包括了末端排放污染颗粒管理技术，如布袋过滤器、旋风除尘、组合除尘、喷雾系统和直接排放，以对抗PM2.5到PM10颗粒物排放。这些技术对于减少煤炭加工设施的空气污染至关重要。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码06,三级代码61.0,四级代码610文件，在完整版文件中第21页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isCombined dust removal，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management95，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / normal production time (hours/year)
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是组合式除尘，其效率为95，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=除尘设备耗电量（千瓦·时/年）/（除尘设备额定功率（千瓦）＊企业正常运转天数（小时/年））。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

源文件中描述为为烟煤和无烟煤，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
